page.title: 08Police in Kensworth Area
page.content: This area is patrolled 8 hours a day,5 days a week by a Resident Beat Officer on motor cycle.We form just a small part of a much wider area which his beat covers. We are also under the watchful eye of a 24 hour panda car patrol.Neither of these patrols carry fire arms.Our R.B.O. mainatains links with Kensworth and Studham children at their village schools and he attends Whipsnade Parish Council meetings. There is generally a low crime rate in the area. The chief problems encountered are thefts from cars,particularly from the zoo car parks. Youths riding motor bikes on prohibited land cause some problems. Our R.B.O. would like to see more Neighbourhood Watch Groups established as an aid to crime prevention.
